name: Microsoft Dynamics 365
description: A suite of intelligent business applications (CRM and ERP) from Microsoft for managing core business processes like sales, customer service, and finance.
primary_use: Acts as the core Customer Relationship Management (CRM) system, feeding customer data, sales history, and service interactions into the DXP for personalization.

name: Adobe Marketo Engage
description: A marketing automation platform that helps companies manage and nurture leads, orchestrate customer journeys, and prove marketing's impact.
primary_use: Manages lead nurturing and email marketing campaigns that drive users to experiences built on the DXP, and receives data back from the DXP to score leads.

name: Salesforce CRM
description: A cloud-based Customer Relationship Management (CRM) platform that provides a single, shared view of every customer for all departments.
primary_use: Serves as the central repository for customer data and sales funnels, integrating with the DXP to personalize user journeys and capture new leads.

name: Vercel
description: A cloud platform for frontend frameworks and static sites, known for its seamless integration with Next.js and its focus on developer experience and high-performance hosting.
primary_use: Serves as the high-performance hosting and deployment platform for the 'head' (the frontend application) in a headless DXP architecture.

name: Bynder
description: A cloud-based Digital Asset Management (DAM) platform that helps brands create, find, and use digital content.
primary_use: Acts as a centralized Digital Asset Management (DAM) system, storing all media (images, videos) that is then pulled into the DXP for use in content and experiences.

name: Google Cloud Platform (GCP)
description: A suite of cloud computing services offered by Google, providing a series of modular cloud services including computing, data storage, data analytics, and machine learning.
primary_use: Provides scalable backend infrastructure, data storage, or specialized AI/ML services that integrate with and support the DXP.

name: Next.js
description: A popular open-source React framework that enables functionalities such as server-side rendering and generating static websites for React-based web applications.
primary_use: The primary framework for building the user-facing website or application that consumes content from the DXP's APIs in a headless implementation.

name: React
description: An open-source JavaScript library for building user interfaces or UI components, maintained by Facebook and a community of individual developers and companies.
primary_use: The foundational JavaScript library used to build the interactive UI components for the frontend application in a headless DXP setup.

name: Microsoft Azure
description: Microsoft's cloud computing platform, offering a wide range of services including computing, analytics, storage, and networking. It's often used for hosting applications and managing enterprise infrastructure.
primary_use: Provides scalable cloud hosting for the DXP itself or for related backend services, databases, and identity management (Microsoft Entra ID).

name: SAP
description: An enterprise resource planning (ERP) software company that provides solutions for managing business operations and customer relations.
primary_use: Integrates business-critical data such as product information (PIM), inventory, and pricing into the DXP, especially for complex e-commerce solutions.

name: ServiceNow
description: A cloud platform that provides digital workflows to manage and automate IT, employee, and customer-related business processes.
primary_use: Manages customer service workflows, allowing the DXP to integrate with support ticketing systems or power self-service help portals.

name: Microsoft Ecosystem
description: General integration with Microsoft's suite of enterprise products, including cloud services, business applications, and other tools.
primary_use: General enterprise integration for identity services (Microsoft Entra ID), productivity tools (M365), and various business applications that feed data into the DXP.

name: Sitecore 360
description: A comprehensive customer success plan from Sitecore that provides expert support, resources, and strategic guidance to help customers maximize the value of their Sitecore investment.
primary_use: A support and success service, not a technology. It provides expert guidance for optimizing the implementation and strategy of the DXP itself.

name: Sitecore JavaScript Services (JSS)
description: A complete SDK for JavaScript developers that enables building full-fledged solutions using Sitecore and modern JavaScript UI libraries and frameworks like React, Angular, and Vue.
primary_use: Acts as the toolkit and SDK for connecting a JavaScript-based frontend application (the 'head') to the Sitecore backend in a headless architecture, managing data fetching and context.
